mapper.select: select ppe.*, pct.comm_name from PSS_price_ewarn ppe left join pss_comm_total pct on ppe.comm_id = pct.comm_id where pct.comm_id in (select comm_id from pss_comm_total where parent_code in ( select comm_id from pss_comm_total where parent_code =#{commId} and data_flag=0 )) and pct.level_code=3 and pct.data_flag=0 order by ppe.ewarn_level desc
